SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.cuda

Class CUDA_MEM_ALLOC_NODE_PARAMS

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.cuda.CUDA_MEM_ALLOC_NODE_PARAMS
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
public class CUDA_MEM_ALLOC_NODE_PARAMS extends Struct implements NativeResource
Memory allocation node parameters.

Layout


 struct CUDA_MEM_ALLOC_NODE_PARAMS {
     CUmemPoolProps poolProps();
     CUmemAccessDesc const * accessDescs();
     size_t accessDescCount();
     size_t bytesize();
     CUdeviceptr dptr();
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • CUDA_MEM_ALLOC_NODE_PARAMS

      public CUDA_MEM_ALLOC_NODE_PARAMS(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a CUDA_MEM_ALLOC_NODE_PARAMS instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.

  • Method Details

    • sizeof

      public int sizeof()
      Description copied from class: Struct
      Returns sizeof(struct).
      Specified by:
      sizeof in class Struct

    • poolProps

      public CUmemPoolProps poolProps()
      in: location where the allocation should reside (specified in location). handleTypes must be MEM_HANDLE_TYPE_NONE. IPC is not supported.

    • accessDescs

      public CUmemAccessDesc.Buffer accessDescs()
      in: array of memory access descriptors. Used to describe peer GPU access

    • accessDescCount

      public long accessDescCount()
      in: number of memory access descriptors. Must not exceed the number of GPUs.

    • bytesize

      public long bytesize()
      in: size in bytes of the requested allocation

    • dptr

      public long dptr()
      out: address of the allocation returned by CUDA
